## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` - New feature or component
- [ ] `fix` - Bug fix
- [ ] `refactor` - Code improvement (no feature/fix)
- [ ] `style` - Formatting changes
- [ ] `test` - Adding or updating tests
- [ ] `docs` - Documentation only
- [ ] `chore` - Build, deps, config changes

## Component Checklist

<!-- If adding/modifying components -->

- [ ] Component follows three-file pattern (`Component.tsx`, `Component.webflow.tsx`, `index.ts`)
- [ ] Uses Client-First naming conventions for CSS classes
- [ ] Uses ShadCN UI primitives where applicable
- [ ] Webflow wrapper flattens nested props correctly
- [ ] Component is properly typed with TypeScript

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Component renders without crashing
- [ ] Props are applied correctly
- [ ] User interactions work as expected
- [ ] Basic accessibility verified (roles, aria-labels)
- [ ] Tests added/updated for changes

## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] `npm run lint` passes with no errors
- [ ] `npm run test` passes with no failures
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Code follows established patterns
